text:
[Verse]
Golden skies and purple hues
Paint the night can't lose
Waves crash on the shore
Feel it deep down to the core

[Verse 2]
Stars are shining in your eyes
Magic happens no surprise
Whispers in the gentle breeze
Heart skips just like the seas

[Chorus]
Dreams that we can touch
Love that means so much
Hold me till the dawn
Together we belong

[Verse 3]
Moments we can't forget
On this night where we met
Hands held tight so near
Forever starts right here

[Bridge]
Colors of the night
Reflecting in your sight
We dance shadows play
In this twilight's sway

[Verse 4]
Promises made under the moon
Humming to a summer tune
Life is brighter in this light
Can't deny the beauty's might
title: Sunset Dreams
